      • syncInventory

        public static void syncInventory(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                 Heroes plugin)
        Synchronize the Clients Inventory with the Server. This is dealt during a scheduler so it happens after ANY changes are made. Synchronizing during changes often results in the client losing Sync.
        Parameters:
        player -
